CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Contact.Loyalty_Status__c,"EPP Default Tier"),"Classique", IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Contact.Loyalty_Status__c,"Carte Classique"), ISPICKVAL(Contact.Loyalty_Status__c,"Carte Classique (Corporate)"), ISPICKVAL(Contact.Loyalty_Status__c,"Carte Classique (Eurostar Staff)")), "Avantage", IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Contact.Loyalty_Status__c,"Carte Blanche"), ISPICKVAL(Contact.Loyalty_Status__c,"Carte Blanche (Eurostar Staff)"), ISPICKVAL(Contact.Loyalty_Status__c,"Carte Blanche(Corporate)"), ISPICKVAL(Contact.Loyalty_Status__c,"Carte Blanche (VIP)")),"Carte Blanche", IF( ISPICKVAL(Contact.Loyalty_Status__c,"Carte Blanche (Elite)"),"Carte Blanche (Elite)",NULL ))))
CustomField.label: Loyalty Tier
